item.description:
Join friends and family for a 3-mile walk through the streets and back roads of Braintree. Have fun, exercise and spend time with one another while raising awareness about the need for affordable housing in your community.

To download a registration form (those with the most pledges win prizes!) go to: http://sshabitat.org/general/home.php

We also need help from volunteers for set-up (8:30 am), registration (9-10:30am), water stops, and clean up (until ~1pm). No need to pay registration if you will be volunteering for us! Just please contact Phoebe to let us know how you can help: direct email is pheebscongo@yahoo.com.

(Rain Date Sunday, 4/28 at 2pm)

Beginning at Sunset Lake on Safford Street in Braintree,

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Building Awareness for Affordable Housing Walk
